Previous: gharNext: ghuṭ

√ghas 'eat'

[present: [1.] ghasati  ]

perfect: jaghā́sa etc.  jakṣīyā́t  

aorist: [1.] ághas (2, 3s.)  ákṣan etc.  aghat (3s.)  ághastām  aghasta (2p.)  ghásas  ghásasat  ghástām  gdha?   -- [2.] aghasat?   -- [3.] ajīghasat  

[future: ghatsyati  ghastā  ]

verbal:

secondary: desiderative: jíghatsati etc. AV.+  

derivatives: kṣú  ghasa AV.+  ghasana C.  ghasmara E.+  ghasra C.  ghasvara C.  ghasí VS.  ghāsá AV.+  -ghāsin VS.  -ghāsyà B.  ghāsí RV.  -gdhi B.  jighatsā B.+  jighatsú AV.+  

Compare √1jakṣ, which is a reduplicated form of this. The anomalous participle gdha occurs only in agdhā́d, and gdhi in ságdhi.
